articles.title: Dividend Stocks: ICICI Bank, Power Grid, Bharti Airtel, among others to trade ex-dividend next week; check details | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The ex-dividend date is the day on which the equity share price adjusts to reflect the next dividend payout. It is the day the stock becomes ex-dividend, which means it does not carry the value of its next dividend payment from that day forward.
articles.content: Shares of several companies including ICICI Bank, Power Grid, RITES, Bharti Airtel, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd (BPCL), Castrol India, among many others will trade ex-dividend in the coming week… [+3414 chars]
